question:
The correct order of match between column X and column Y is:

| X | Y |
|---|---|
| I. Vitamin A | i. Muscular weakness |
| II. Vitamin D | ii. Increased blood clotting time |
| III. Vitamin E | iii. Night-blindness |
| IV. Vitamin K | iv. Osteomalacia |
choices: I-iii, II-ii, III - iv, IV - i
I-iii, II - iv, III - i, IV - ii
I- iv, II- iii, III - ii, IV - i
I-ii, II-i, III - iii, IV - iv
explanation: I. Vitamin A deficiency causes Night-blindness (iii).
II. Vitamin D deficiency causes Osteomalacia/Rickets (iv).
III. Vitamin E deficiency causes Muscular weakness (i).
IV. Vitamin K deficiency causes Increased blood clotting time (ii).
Correct match: I-iii, II-iv, III-i, IV-ii.
